name: Drogskol Reinforcements
oracle_text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

name: Fell the Mighty
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

oracle_text:
Flying

name: Falkenrath Gorger
oracle_text: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Exotic Orchard
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

—Pulan, Bant orchardist

oracle_text:

• Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
